title: Why do I smell like farts and poop? - Quora

response.answer_text: Because you are a heavy drinker, or taking some substance. Isn't a knickname for cannabis shit. Or you have fish odour syndrome which makes you smell of fish or garbage or shit. You maybe allergic to something like coffee, or chocolate. Good luck. Make sure you fart when you need to, get those gases out of your body, its perfectly normal.
